short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View and update Contacts, Candidates, Job Applications and create notes in JobAdder directly from Gmail.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The JobAdder Gmail Extension allows JobAdder users to view and update their JobAdder records from within Gmail. Includes the ability to view and update Candidate and Contact info as well as the ability create new Candidates, Contacts, Job Applications and notes.
